title: OS Build Quality Automation & Tools Engineer
summary: The OS Build Quality team is seeking an OS Quality Engineer to drive testing and coordination of QA effort across multiple platforms at Apple.
description: You will be responsible for developing and maintaining automated testing of first-party applications on iOS, macOS, and watchOS. You will need to identify and communicate key build quality issues, and work towards resolutions on the critical issues affecting the build quality.
key_qualifications: A keen eye for quality, experience writing automated UI and non-UI tests in Swift or Python, experience with Xcode, Xcode Cloud, XCTest/XCUITest is a plus, professional experience working in software development and testing, creative thinker and strong problem solver, ability to investigate, debug, and triage difficult problems, excellent written and verbal communication skills, highly organized, creative, and passionate about achieving results, passion for user-focused design & high-quality technology.
education_experience: BS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or equivalent experience.
pay_benefits: Apple offers a base pay range of $129,600 - $236,300 for this role. Apple employees receive comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and free services, reimbursement for certain educational expenses, stock options, and more.
